actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to provide energy conservation by alleviating current and continuing fuel waste, to reduced empty vehicle movements, and to increase efficiency in transporting goods by motor carriers which will ultimately benefit consumers, and for other purposes.
short_title: Diesel Fuel and Gasoline Conservation Act of 1979

summary.text: Diesel Fuel and Gasoline Conservation Act of 1979 - Amends the Energy Policy and Conservation Act to authorize sellers of goods under a uniform zone delivered pricing system to grant backhaul allowances to buyers where: (1) the backhaul function is actually performed by the buyer; (2) where the allowance is not greater than actual savings in delivery costs; and (3) where such allowances are available to all customers on a nondiscriminatory basis.

titles.title: Diesel Fuel and Gasoline Conservation Act of 1979

A bill to provide energy conservation by alleviating current and continuing fuel waste, to reduced empty vehicle movements, and to increase efficiency in transporting goods by motor carriers which will ultimately benefit consumers, and for other purposes.
